title: You Hang Up First
alt: No, YOU stumble past a series of post-breakup hookups in a daze as you slowly realize what you've lost and how unlikely you are ever to get it back first.
transcript:
[Cueball is sitting on a bed, on the phone.]
Cueball: You hang up first.[Megan is lying on a bed, on the phone.]
Megan: No, you hang up first.Cueball: No, you hang up first.Megan: No, you fucking hang up first!Cueball: You hang up first, or we're OVER!Megan: Then I guess we're fucking OVER!Cueball: FINE!Megan: ...Cueball: ...Megan: You move on and find somebody else first.
